text: Mrs. Thomas Gainsborough, nee Margaret Burr is an oil painting by Thomas Gainsborough. It was painted about 1778. It measures 76.6 cm x 63.8 cm. It hangs in the Courtauld Institute Galleries in England. The subject is the artist's wife. == References == * == Other reading == * Category:1770s paintings Category:Paintings by Thomas Gainsborough Category:1778
title: Mrs. Thomas Gainsborough, nee Margaret Burr
